text: "Before You Accuse Me" (also known as "Before You Accuse Me (Take a Look at Yourself)") is a 1958 blues song by Bo Diddley. It has been covered by Creedence Clearwater Revival for their fifth studio album Cosmo's Factory and Eric Clapton for his 11th studio album Joureyman and was the B-side to his song Pretending. Category:1958 songs Category:Bo Diddley Category:Creedence Clearwater Revival songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: Before You Accuse Me
